summary: AN ORDINANCE abandoning the unexpended balances in certain 1969 and prior appropriations made from the General, Park, Library, City-County Health, Seattle Center, Cumulative Reserve, Emergency, City Street, Arterial City Street, Special Nursing, Seattle General Street Improvement Bonds 1960, Seattle Park Improvement Bonds 1960, Park Acquisition and Development, Municipal Sewerage 1959 Construction, Light, Water, Sewer, Garbage Collection and Disposal, Engineering Department Operating, Building Department Operating, Motor Transportation, Purchasing Agent's Revolving, Public Health, Urban Renewal Operating, and Employees Retirement Funds.
